70 template <typename Array, typename Op,
71  typename std::enable_if<is_dense<Array>::value>::type* = nullptr>
72 inline Array make_array(World& world, const detail::trange_t<Array>& trange,
73  const std::shared_ptr<detail::pmap_t<Array> >& pmap,
74  Op&& op) {
75  typedef typename Array::value_type value_type;
76  typedef typename value_type::range_type range_type;
77 
78  // Make an empty result array
79  Array result(world, trange);
80 
81  // Iterate over local tiles of arg
82  for (const auto index : *result.pmap()) {
83  // Spawn a task to evaluate the tile
84  auto tile = world.taskq.add(
85  [=](const range_type& range) -> value_type {
86  value_type tile;
87  op(tile, range);
88  return tile;
89  },
90  trange.make_tile_range(index));
91 
92  // Store result tile
93  result.set(index, tile);
94  }
95 
96  return result;
97 }
98 
100 
134 template <typename Array, typename Op,
135  typename std::enable_if<!is_dense<Array>::value>::type* = nullptr>
136 inline Array make_array(World& world, const detail::trange_t<Array>& trange,
137  const std::shared_ptr<detail::pmap_t<Array> >& pmap,
138  Op&& op) {
139  typedef typename Array::value_type value_type;
140  typedef typename Array::size_type size_type;
141  typedef std::pair<size_type, Future<value_type> > datum_type;
142 
143  // Create a vector to hold local tiles
144  std::vector<datum_type> tiles;
145  tiles.reserve(pmap->size());
146 
147  // Construct a tensor to hold updated tile norms for the result shape.
148  TiledArray::Tensor<
149  typename detail::shape_t<Array>::value_type,
150  Eigen::aligned_allocator<typename detail::shape_t<Array>::value_type> >
151  tile_norms(trange.tiles_range(), 0);
152 
153  // Construct the task function used to construct the result tiles.
154  madness::AtomicInt counter;
155  counter = 0;
156  int task_count = 0;
157  auto task = [&](const size_type index) -> value_type {
158  value_type tile;
159  tile_norms[index] = op(tile, trange.make_tile_range(index));
160  ++counter;
161  return tile;
162  };
163 
164  for (const auto index : *pmap) {
165  auto result_tile = world.taskq.add(task, index);
166  ++task_count;
167  tiles.emplace_back(index, std::move(result_tile));
168  }
169 
170  // Wait for tile norm data to be collected.
171  if (task_count > 0)
172  world.await(
173  [&counter, task_count]() -> bool { return counter == task_count; });
174 
175  // Construct the new array
176  Array result(world, trange,
177  typename Array::shape_type(world, tile_norms, trange), pmap);
178  for (auto& it : tiles) {
179  const size_type index = it.first;
180  if (!result.is_zero(index)) result.set(it.first, it.second);
181  }
182 
183  return result;
184 }
185

220 template <typename Array, typename Op>
221 inline Array make_array(World& world, const detail::trange_t<Array>& trange,
222  Op&& op) {
223  return make_array<Array>(world, trange,
224  detail::policy_t<Array>::default_pmap(
225  world, trange.tiles_range().volume()),
226  op);
227 }
228 
229 } // namespace TiledArray
